mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (cNo, id, cSerial_Number, cName, cDiscount_Amount, cIsUsed, cRegdate, cExpiration_Date) VALUES(coupon_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSerial_Number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDiscount_Amount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cIsUsed, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE+180)
